channel.title: SFol 54: Ultimate Pick 2 (18/18) [Game Not In Progress]
channel.description:
# 10 26 19
# Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
# Special Mechanics
*You think I put effort into this? Hah!*
* Signups will go on forever until either a majority of signed up players vote to end them or nobody has signed up for 48 hours. * Once signups are closed, i will send all the players a google form. This form NEEDS to be filled out compeltly * Scum will follow this formula X * 3 +1=Playercount. X is the number of scum, for every 2 group scum there will be one neutral killer
# Rolelist
*Only god knows what abomination will you guys create*
# Playerlist
1. Luxy 2. Arete 3. Monokuma (Alice) 4. Blizer 5. KyoDaz 6. PoisonedSquid 7. JakeTheWolfe 8. Geyde 9. Wazza 10. Simon 11. MaximusPrime 12. H_Hjasik 13. PokemonKidRyan 14. BlueStorm 15. Boss 16. Marshal 17. SirDerpsALot 18. Shurian
# Backups
* Datbird
* Maxwell

item.title: SFol 54: Ultimate Pick 2 (18/18) [Game Not In Progress]
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
I’m sending out rolecards now.

A few notes:

  • Unfortunately, no ITAs. If there were, they would have to be = or <1%
  • No D1 lynch. D1 will be 24 hours
  • Game is less bastard than Clown Fiesta, but more bastard than LotRFM
  • Uninformed majority is called They targeted gamers, informed minority is called Kai_5, and neutrals are called Obama

Read full topic
